Content:
Hi Alice,

Just wanted to follow up on our meeting yesterday. The proposal looks great, and we're excited to move forward. Let me know if you have any questions.

Best,
Bob
Subject: Following up on our meeting

Content:
Hi Bob,

Thanks for the follow-up! Glad to hear you liked the proposal. Just a quick question regarding the timeline â€“ could we potentially push the start date by a week?

Best,
Alice
